articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Strategic Force Command
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Strategic Force Command
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un inspected the Command of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on Aug. 14.
					 He waved back to enthusiastically cheering service members and posed for a picture with them.
					
					 He went round historical mementoes and data displayed at the Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Study Hall.
					
					 Going round them, he looked back with deep emotion on the great leadership feats of the brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu, recorded on every page of the history of the KPA Strategic Force displaying its might with the strength unprecedented in the world as a powerful strike service, symbolic of the dignity and power of Korea.
					
					 Then he listened to General Kim Rak Gyom's decision on the Strategic Force's plan for an enveloping fire at Guam at the command post.
					
					 He examined the plan for a long time and discussed it with the commanding officers in real earnest.
					
					 He praised the KPA Strategic Force for drawing up a close and careful plan as planned and intended by the Party and examined the firing preparations for power demonstration.
					
					 After listening to the commander of the Strategic Force that it is waiting for the order of the Party Central Committee after rounding off the preparations for the enveloping fire at Guam, he said with great satisfaction that the spirit of Hwasong artillerymen is very high and he was freshly determined, seeing by himself the combat preparedness and the sky-high spirit of the Hwasong artillerymen of the large combined unit.
					
					 He said that the U.S. imperialists caught the noose around their necks due to their reckless military confrontation racket, adding that he would watch a little more the foolish and stupid conduct of the Yankees spending a hard time of every minute of their miserable lot.
					
					 He said that he wants to advise the U.S., which is driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into the touch-and-go situation, running helter-skelter, to take into full account gains and losses with clear head whether the prevailing situation is more unfavorable for any party.
					
					 In order to defuse the tensions and prevent the dangerous military conflict on the Korean peninsula, it is necessary for the U.S. to make a proper option first and show it through action, as it committed provocations after introducing huge nuclear strategic equipment into the vicinity of the peninsula, he said, adding that the U.S. should stop at once arrogant provocations against the DPRK and unilateral demands and not provoke it any longer.
					
					 He said that if the Yankees persist in their extremely dangerous reckless actions on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity, testing the self-restraint of the DPRK, the latter will make an important decision as it already declared, warning the U.S. that it should think reasonably and judge properly not to suffer shame that it is hit by the DPRK again.
					
					 He said that if the planned fire of power demonstration is carried out as the U.S. is going more reckless, it will be the most delightful historic moment when the Hwasong artillerymen will wring the windpipes of the Yankees and point daggers at their necks, underlining the need to be always ready for launching to go into action anytime once our Party decides.
					
					 Looking round a military training school and gymnasium, he called for firmly establishing Juche in education and steadily improving the quality of military training and thus preparing all the artillerymen of the large combined units to be fighters capable of waging campaign of brains, who perfectly mastered the modern military science and technology, the enemy's changed war methods and Korean-style war methods against them.
					
					 He underscored the need to certainly establish the system of reeducating commanding officers and technicians of the Strategic Force in line with the modernization and upgrading of ballistic rockets.
					
					 Going round the supply service facilities of the large combined unit including the dining hall of sub-unit, he took warm care of the solders' life as their real father would do.
					
					 He enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of the large combined unit at the solders hall.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the good performance given by members of the art squad through numbers vividly representing the operational mission and features of the Strategic Force and desire, thoughts and feelings of the Hwasong artillerymen, and gave precious teachings for performance.
					
					 The Strategic Force has a very important position and duty in carrying out the strategic plans of the Workers' Party of Korea, he said, stressing the need for the Strategic Force to firmly establish the monolithic leadership system, command and management system of the Supreme Commander over the nuclear force and further complete the Juche-oriented rocket strike methods.
					
					 Giving teachings of great trust that he remains confident thanks to the KPA Strategic Force, reliable treasured sword guaranteeing the everlasting future of the country and nation, he expressed expectation and belief that all the officers and men of the Strategic Force would bring about a fresh turn in rounding off combat preparations, bearing in mind the important mission they have assumed before the Party, the country and the people.
					
					 The officers and men of the KPA Strategic Force, who received great trust from him, were firmly determined to score the final victory in the standoff with the U.S. by scorching with super strong strike the targets in south Korea, Japan, operational area in the Pacific and the U.S. mainland, flying the sacred red flags of the Party and flags of the supreme commander at every matchless launching pad once he gives an order.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and Kim Jong Sik, vice department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Russian President
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm greetings to you and, through you, to your friendly people on the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 I express belief that the relations of friendship between the DPRK and Russia forged through the common struggle in the grim days of the great anti-Japanese war would invariably develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Taking myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you success in your responsible work for building powerful Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Lao President
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the C.C., Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend my warmest congratulations and comradely greetings to you on your 80th birthday.
					
					 I am pleased that the fraternal Lao people are making big successes in the efforts to achieve the country's prosperity and consolidate the people's democratic system under the correct guidance of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party headed by you.
					
					 Convinced that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, states and peoples provided and developed by the preceding leaders would steadily strengthen, I heartily wish you good health, happiness and bigger success in your responsible work.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on August 11.
					 In the message, the president extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the day of liberation.
					
					 We look back in reverence on the soldiers of the Red Army and patriots of Korea who laid down their lives in the struggle for freedom and independence of your country, the message said.
					
					 I am convinced that further strengthening the friendship and constructive cooperation between Russia and the DPRK is in line with our common interests and would contribute to ensuring peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and rest of Northeast Asia, the message noted.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and success and wished all the people of the DPRK happiness and wellbeing.

articles.title: Greetings to Congolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Congolese President
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Denis Sassou Nguesso, president of the Republic of Congo, on the 57th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the Congolese government and people greater successes in their struggle to build a peaceful and prosperous, new society under the wise guidance of the president, expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to strengthen.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets National Chairman of People's Progressive Party of Nigeria
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets National Chairman of People's Progressive Party of Nigeria
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria and co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu who is participating in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and his party on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Issue of Detained Americans
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Issue of Detained Americans
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on Tuesday as regards foreign media reports that the issue on the detained Americans is now on discussion between the DPRK and the U.S. through their contact channel in New York:
					 The issue on detained Americans is not an object to discuss in view of the present atmosphere of DPRK-U.S. relations.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath at the Liberation Tower on Tuesday, the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Alexandr Minaev, Russian charge d'Affaires ad interim, and staff members of his embassy and representatives and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 After a wreath was laid in the name of the Russian embassy, the participants paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 The members of the Russian embassy also laid a wreath and bouquets at the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District of Pyongyang.
					
					 Earlier, they placed bouquets at liberation towers, statues of Soviet soldiers, cemeteries of fallen fighters and monuments to fallen soldiers in local areas.
					
					 Meanwhile, staff members of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin laid wreaths before the liberation tower and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Reception Given in Honor of Participants in 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Reception Given in Honor of Participants in 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The International Preparatory Committee and the Korean Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu gave a reception at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday in honor of the participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of various countries and regions and international democratic organizations and personages of various circles that are participating in the above-said festival.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is honorary chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Lawmaker Madav Kumar Nepal, former prime minister of Nepal and honorary chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, co-chairpersons of the preparatory committee of the gathering, vice-chairman of the Korean Preparatory Committee for the gathering, and others.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the Korean Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, spoke there.
					
					 She said that the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu is being held with splendor as the international great gathering for praising the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 She noted that the Korean people would certainly build a reunified and prosperous great Paektusan nation under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and dynamically advance toward the rosy future of humankind with the world progressives.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, took the floor.
					
					 He said that HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il were the peerless statesmen and outstanding leaders possessed of rare ideological and theoretical wisdom, tested guidance and noble virtues.
					
					 He noted that he would extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people's just cause, always bearing in mind reverence for the great men in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Orders and Medals Awarded Foreigners
articles.content:
DPRK Orders and Medals Awarded Foreigners
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK orders and medals were awarded to foreigners participating in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					
					 Order of DPRK Friendship 1st Class was awarded to Madav Kumar Nepal, chairman of the Nepal Committee for the Promotion of Korea's Reunification, Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, C. P. Mainali, chairman of the Nepalese National Memorial Committee for President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, Raymond Ferguson, national secretary of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, Shingo Kanemaru, adviser of the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge, and its representative Seizaburo Ekuchi in recognition of their active efforts for supporting the just cause of the Korean people and the development of friendship with the DPRK in deep reverence for the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.
					
					 Order of DPRK Order 2nd Class were awarded to 21 foreigners including Helmi El Hadidi, chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, Damian Ogbonna, chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, Neil Fitzgerald, national chairman of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico,  MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, Dermot Hudson, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and friendship medal went to 16 foreigners.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Hong Son Ok, secretary general of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, vice-chairmen of the Korean Preparatory Committee of the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and figures from different countries, regions and international democratic organizations participating in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu Held
articles.content:
Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu Held
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday.
					 Present a the gathering were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is honorary chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the Korean Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and others.
					
					 Present there were honorary chairpersons and co-chairpersons of the International Preparatory Committee for the above-said gathering, delegations and delegates of various countries and regions and international democratic organizations, personages of various circles, members of the diplomatic missions here, etc.
					
					 Conveyed there were a floral basket to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent by the participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and silk banners, medals, honorary titles, prizes, diplomas, and gifts to the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu presented by international and regional preparatory committees for the above-said gathering, international democratic organizations, foreign political parties, organizations, institutions and personages of various circles.
					
					 Peter Woods, ambassador of the United Cities and Local Governments-Asia Pacific who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, said in his report that since an appeal for holding an international great gathering for praising the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu was released in October, 2015, activities for revering the peerlessly great sages and supporting the Korean people's just cause have been briskly conducted all over the world.
					
					 He expressed belief that the current festival would become a significant occasion demonstrating before the world the ardent desire of the progressives for praising the exploits of HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il and glorifying the 21st century as the great one of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who is chairman of the Nepalese National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, stressed that the human history has seen many famous persons but none of them is on a par with HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il as they have been boundlessly revered by the world people not only in their lives but also after their demise.
					
					 Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK who is co-chairman of the International Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, said that all the world revolutionary peoples who received the 2017 Paektusan declaration would make a dynamic struggle for building a new society in which independence is realized, entrusting the rosy future to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the Korean Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, extended thanks to all delegations and delegates who are giving wide publicity to the exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and extending support and solidarity to the Korean people's just cause on behalf of the Korean Preparatory Committee for the above-said gathering.
					
					 She stressed that the Korean people would wage a dynamic struggle for realizing the genuine international justice with the world peace-loving people.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un presented by the participants in the festival was adopted at the gathering.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a letter from the participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu on Tuesday.
					 The letter said that they paid the highest tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, eternal leaders of the Korean people, and extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, state and army of the DPRK, on the Day of Korea's Liberation and Day of Songun.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il enjoy boundless reverence and admiration from all people as they provided the eternal foundations for Korea's freedom and prosperity and performed undying feats for the human cause of independence with their rare wisdom, distinguished leadership ability and noble virtues.
					
					 Your Excellency Kim Jong Un are being lauded by the international community as the most outstanding statesman and military strategist in the preset era as you have remarkably bolstered up the overall national strength of Songun Korea even under the gravest circumstances and reliably defended peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the world.
					
					 In the period of the current festival, we will praise HE Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of Juche and Songun and make every possible effort to further develop the festival into a regular grand political and cultural one with the honor and pride of holding in high esteem Your Excellency Kim Jong Un as the great sun of the 21st century who is guiding the global cause of independence to victory.
					
					 The letter expressed belief that thanks to Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, fully identical to the preceding leaders in idea, leadership and personality, the dignity and prestige of the great Paektusan nation would be further exalted and the 21st century would shine as a century seeing the victory of the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the American Regional Preparatory Committee and the Peruvian Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu on Tuesday on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					 On the same day, he received floral baskets from Osaka of the Citizens Solidarity Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK, Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship and the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for the Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civilian Exchange on the occasion of the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the British Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, a delegation of activists for Japan-Korea friendship and the Choson Exchange Association in Singapore on the occasion of the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					 The floral baskets were separately handed over to the officials concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Participants in 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Participants in 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the participants in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by the chairman of the Mongolian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the secretary general of the Belgium-Korea Friendship Association on behalf of the participants in the festival on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The family of internationalist soldier Ya. T. Nobichenko sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of Korea's Liberation.
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), civilians from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of national liberation.
					 Seen standing before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill was a floral basket from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid at the statues were floral baskets in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF and institutions, industrial establishments and schools in Pyongyang, together with bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also laid there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid homage to the peerlessly great men before their statues.
					
					 Floral baskets were also placed before the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts in Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons, civilians and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: More Rallies Held to Support DPRK Government's Statement
articles.content:
More Rallies Held to Support DPRK Government's Statement
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Rallies took place in Jagang Province, North Hamgyong Province and Rason City on Monday to fully support the statement of the DPRK government.
					 Present at the rallies were officials of the local party, power, economic organs, working organizations, factories, enterprises, farms and universities, working people, youths and students.
					
					 Read out there was a statement of the DPRK government and speeches were made by vice-chairpersons of the provincial and city party committees and representatives of the workers, farmers, intellectuals and youths.
					
					 Speakers supported the DPRK government's statement categorically rejecting the "sanctions resolution" illegally cooked up by the U.S. and other hostile forces, finding fault with the DPRK's test-launch of ICBM.
					
					 They stressed that it is the immutable truth of the service personnel and people of the DPRK that as long as they are led by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the revolutionary cause of Juche is sure to triumph despite the enemies' desperate efforts and there is no one who block their way in the world.
					
					 They said that the U.S. and other hostile forces fabricated the UN "sanctions resolutions" several times while pulling up the DPRK's exercise of its just right so far but neither sanctions nor pressure could bring the latter to their knees.
					
					 They stressed that as long as they are led by Kim Jong Un and have the single-minded unity and spirit of self-development more powerful than nuclear weapons, the service personnel and people of the DPRK would firmly defend the country's security and win the final victory in the cause of socialism though any formidable enemies of the world invade the DPRK.
					
					 The rallies were followed by public procession.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at U.S. Acts of Hostility
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at U.S. Acts of Hostility
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- All the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are afire with the strong indignation against the U.S. which has gone crazy with reckless war hysteria, not content with sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK in cooperation with its servile forces.
					 From every corner of the country can be heard the statement of the DPRK government, which rejected the UNSC "sanctions resolution" 2371, as well as anti-U.S. songs blared from loudspeakers.
					
					 Press media also report about the public response and mass rallies supporting the government statement and calling for making a steady advance toward the final victory in socialism, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and building of nuclear force.
					
					 Working people, youth and students across the country are petitioning to be allowed to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army, while members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and other powerful civil defense forces of the country intensifying the combat and political training than ever before.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Pak Chol, a worker at the Chollima Steel Complex, said:
					
					 We can never remain a passive onlooker to the war hysteria of megalomaniacal Yankees desperately keen on wringing our windpipe.
					
					 As a member of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, I will always get ready for action and once the zero hour offers itself, I will rush to the field of decisive battle, yelling the slogan "Destroy the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemy of the Korean people!"

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Flailed for Scheme to Cover up Truth about Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Flailed for Scheme to Cover up Truth about Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims issued a statement Tuesday, 72 years since the end of World War II with the surrender of the Japanese imperialism which caused horrible disaster and casualties.
					 The statement said:
					
					 When the whole world mourns the guiltless war dead, high-ranking officials and politicians of Japan visited the Yasukuni Shrine which enshrines the departed soul of war criminals who took their lives and textbooks, which distorted the aggression war as "war of justice" and colonial rule over other nations as "cooperation and contribution" to the development and prosperity, found their way to younger generation.
					
					 Moreover, they are busy reexamining the Kono statement, which officially recognizes sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, in a bid to overturn truth about it though it was proved materially and its illegalness was confirmed by the international law and staging a trial of the newspaper office which disclosed the sexual slavery.
					
					 Japan is running amuck for international sanctions against the DPRK, citing a "threat" from it and creating extreme hostile sentiment and bad blood towards the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan. Lurking behind this ruckus is a cynical ploy to escape from Japan's reparation for its past crimes which it has evaded for decades.
					
					 There is the only one option for Japan now when the DPRK's strategic position rises day by day as a nuclear power of Juche and the world's military power.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should clearly know that it is destiny and necessity of Japan to adequately redress the unethical crimes committed against Korea and its people and honestly reflect on and assume responsibility for the crimes committed against the Asian people in the past including the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: Data on Japan's Past Crimes against Koreans Found
articles.content:
Data on Japan's Past Crimes against Koreans Found
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Data on Koreans who suffered from mental disease after being drafted to the Pacific War ignited by the Japanese imperialists was found at a hospital in Chiba Prefecture of Japan, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 According to it, at least 100 Koreans had suffered from mental disorder by despair and nightmare after being forcibly drafted by the Japanese imperialists to the war site at that time.
					
					 One of them died at the hospital, undergoing hardships with mental disease for decades even after the war.

articles.title: DPRK Will Smash U.S. Sanctions Strategy by Dint of Self-reliance, Self-development
articles.content:
DPRK Will Smash U.S. Sanctions Strategy by Dint of Self-reliance, Self-development
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. assertion that economic sanctions against are needed as its ICBM test-launch "poses threat to international peace and security" is nothing but sophism to cover up its vicious scheme for stifling the DPRK and justify its criminal moves.
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Tuesday says this.
					
					 The DPRK's strategic weapons can never be incriminated in any case as they are powerful self-defensive means to defend the sovereignty of the country and the security of the people from the U.S. persistent hostile policy and threat of aggression, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts to establish an international cooperation system against the DPRK after describing its legitimate ICBM test-launch as "threat" and "provocation" in a far-fetched way. This is no more than an expression of the despair and feelings of frustration from its totally bankrupt hostile policy toward the DPRK and last-ditch efforts of those seeking to get rid of the abyss of ruin.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks that the DPRK, which emerged a nuclear power of Juche, the world's military power with everything in need, under the worst adversity, would put the precious nuclear deterrent for self-defense gained by it with blood on the negotiating table and regard it as bargaining chip.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces' sanctions racket against the DPRK are making the DPRK accelerate the Juche-orientation of its national economy at the faster speed and harden the faith that the only way out is to keep the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever foil the U.S. sanctions strategy by dint of self-reliance and self-development and dash ahead like the wind at the speed of Mallima to build a socialist power.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Today is a great auspicious day in the Korean nation's history when a fundamental change took place in hewing out the independent destiny of the Korean people and a new origin was given for socialist Korea, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Tuesday.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung achieved the historic cause of the country's liberation. Thanks to this day the dark era of national distress ended forever, the Korean people came to enter a wide road of creating a new life and the country could shed its rays as a genuine people's country.
					
					 His feat for the country's liberation is an immortal one that should be praised and glorified generation after generation, and the Korean people will always remain descendants and members of one family of the President.
					
					 He was the savior of the national rebirth, peerless patriot and father of socialist Korea as he led the bloody anti-Japanese revolutionary war to victory to liberate the country usurped by Japanese imperialism and built a prosperous and invincible country on this land where backwardness and poverty prevailed.
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding leadership of the President who wisely guided the revolution and construction on the basis of anti-Japanese revolutionary tradition and fighting experience established in the forest of Paektu, the army and people of the DPRK could win a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, post-war rehabilitation, social revolution of several stages and socialist construction.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, cherishing the far-sighted intention to add shine to Korea, advanced the revolution and construction as required by the idea and intention of the President, regarding it as his lifelong mission to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of the President.
					
					 The history of victory and prosperity of the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, socialist Korea is given steady continuity thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Minju Joson in an editorial calls upon all the officials and other working people to glorify Juche Korea which was liberated and glorified by the great leaders into a socialist power, an envy of the world, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Stop to War Exercises and Conclusion of Peace Treaty Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Will Smash U.S. Sanctions Strategy by Dint of Self-reliance, Self-development
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. assertion that economic sanctions against are needed as its ICBM test-launch "poses threat to international peace and security" is nothing but sophism to cover up its vicious scheme for stifling the DPRK and justify its criminal moves.
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Tuesday says this.

This is no more than an expression of the despair and feelings of frustration from its totally bankrupt hostile policy toward the DPRK and last-ditch efforts of those seeking to get rid of the abyss of ruin.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks that the DPRK, which emerged a nuclear power of Juche, the world's military power with everything in need, under the worst adversity, would put the precious nuclear deterrent for self-defense gained by it with blood on the negotiating table and regard it as bargaining chip.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces' sanctions racket against the DPRK are making the DPRK accelerate the Juche-orientation of its national economy at the faster speed and harden the faith that the only way out is to keep the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever foil the U.S. sanctions strategy by dint of self-reliance and self-development and dash ahead like the wind at the speed of Mallima to build a socialist power.

articles.title: S. Korean Military's Reckless War Gambling Derided
articles.content:
S. Korean Military's Reckless War Gambling Derided
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military warmongers staged frantic live-shell firing drill targeting the DPRK in the hotspot waters of the West Sea of Korea on August 7.
					 That afternoon they fired hundreds of artillery shells and rockets with the mobilization of various artillery pieces and army helicopters belonging to the 6th marine brigade and unit stationed on Paekryong and Yonphyong Islets.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Tuesday derides this as a thoughtless act of colonial mercenary army fearful of the strategic position of the DPRK and its military might growing stronger with each passing day.
					
					 The despicable act of the sycophantic traitors who work as cannon fodder for the U.S. reminds one of devil's martyr perishing in needless danger, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet warmongers should clearly know that the army and people of the DPRK are closely following the every move of the U.S. imperialist aggressors and war fanatics with surging hatred toward the U.S.
					
					 They should not run amuck, mindful that their wild act counting on the U.S. that gets bogged in the mud, will only invite merciless heavy fire.

articles.title: Statue of Forcibly Drafted Worker Erected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Statue of Forcibly Drafted Worker Erected in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean CBS, a statue of a forcibly drafted worker was erected in Inchon City of south Korea to bear witness to the Japanese imperialists' crimes.
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea organized a committee for promoting the erection of a statue of a forcibly drafted worker in February and have since launched a campaign for probe into the truth behind the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists who forcibly drafted the young and middle-aged Koreans.
					
					 A ceremony of unveiling the statue took place at the Puphyong Park in Inchon City on Aug. 12.

articles.title: DR Congolese Party Slams U.S. for Cooking Up "Sanctions Resolutions" against DPRK
articles.content:
DR Congolese Party Slams U.S. for Cooking Up "Sanctions Resolutions" against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo held a special meeting on Aug. 9 as regards the successful second test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-14 in the DPRK.
					A political statement was adopted at the meeting, which said:
					
					The U.S. is suffering from a big nightmare as the whole U.S. mainland is within striking range of the DPRK's ICBM Hwasong-14.
					
					The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is bound to go bankrupt though the former has resorted to unheard-of political isolation, economic blockade and military pressure while brandishing nuclear stick.
					
					It is too natural that the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK would further endanger the security of the U.S. mainland and the U.S. would meet an end on this planet.
					
					All the measures taken by the DPRK are the legitimate ones for self-defense of a sovereign state to defend its sovereignty and rights to existence and development.
					
					Nevertheless, the U.S. let the United Nations cook up the "sanctions resolutions", pushing the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					The U.S. should be wholly responsible for all the consequences to be entailed by the illegal "sanctions resolution" aimed at totally blocking the economic development and the improvement of people's living standard of a sovereign state.
					
					It should roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and recognize the strategic position of socialist Korea.
					
					We fully support the DPRK's steps for self-defense and will always stand by the side of the Korean people.

articles.title: DPRK's ICBM Test-Launch Hailed in India, Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK's ICBM Test-Launch Hailed in India, Nigeria
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Indian and Nigerian organizations made public statements on Aug. 2 and 4 to congratulate the DPRK on its successful second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said in its statement the great success in the second test-launch of Hwasong-14 was an exciting victory that demonstrated to the world the might of the DPRK as a nuclear power in the East and that it is a warning to the U.S. and other hostile forces hell-bent on the sanctions and pressure campaign.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in the ICBM test-launches one after another, but the U.S. is crying out for a war and extreme sanctions, failing to judge the situation properly.
					
					 The U.S. should act with discretion, properly understanding the strategic position of the DPRK, which emerged a world-level nuclear and rocket power, and the will of its army and people to take a retaliatory punishment to the U.S.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 The DPRK, through the second ICBM test-launch, displayed its capability to carry out a surprise ICBM launch at any region and place at anytime and clearly proved that the whole mainland of the U.S. is within striking range of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. resorts to the military adventure and "toughest sanctions" despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, it can never escape the disastrous consequences.
					
					 We resolutely condemn all the U.S. policies hostile toward the DPRK.
					
					 We extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-launch Hailed Abroad
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries issued statements between July 30 and August 2 in support of the DPRK's successful second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14.
					 The Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism formed in Austria said in a statement that the successful ICBM test-launch is the historic event that ended the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK which has lasted for more than half a century.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The strategic position of the DPRK has exceptionally strengthened through the test-launch.
					
					 The DPRK possessed of nuke and ICBM has been recognized as a country with strong military might which no one dares to provoke.
					
					 The U.S. should abolish the hostile policy toward the DPRK as soon as possible, withdraw its troops from south Korea and stop despicable moves for blocking the reunification of Korea.
					
					 The Dnepropetrovsk branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the DPRK's successive success in ICBM test-launch only a few developed countries can do is a great victory won by science and technology of Juche and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, adding:
					
					 The Korean people showed the whole world that the road chosen by themselves is just.
					
					 We fully support all the measures taken by the DPRK to bolster the nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 The history of the ever-victorious DPRK teaches the oppressed people of the world how to struggle.
					
					 The Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said that the successful second test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 marked an occasion of further advancing Korean socialism and that the imperialists should recognize the strategic position of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona la comandancia de fuerzas estrategicas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona la comandancia de fuerzas estrategicas de EPC
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un inspecciono el dia 14 la comandancia de las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El Maximo Dirigente respondio con la mano al saludo de los oficiales y soldados que le dan fervientes aclamaciones y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Y recorrio los objetos y datos historicos, exhibidos en la sala de estudio de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo donde recordo con emocion las sagradas hazanas directivas de los geniales comandantes del Paektu, impregnadas en la trayectoria de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC que con la capacidad nunca vista en el mundo exalta su poderio como potente tropa de ataque que simboliza la dignidad y el poderio nacional de Corea.
					
					En el puesto de mando de la comandancia, el Maximo Dirigente escucho el parte de decision del general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom sobre el proyecto de disparo de asedio sobre la isla Guam.
					
					Y reviso detalladamente el proyecto durante largo tiempo y lo discutio seriamente con los comandantes.
					
					Evaluo que las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC trazaron de manera muy minuciosa y detallada el proyecto de disparo conforme a la idea y proposito del Partido y chequeo el estado de los preparativos para dar el fuego amenazador.
					
					Informado del parte del comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas de que estan esperando la orden del Comite Central del Partido despues de terminada la preparacion de disparo de asedio sobre la isla Guam, el Maximo Dirigente expreso la satisfaccion diciendo que tomo nueva decision al ver hoy en la gran unidad combinada el estado de alerta combativa y el aspecto muy animado de los artilleros Hwasong.
					
					Al perpetrar las locuras militares de confrontacion militar los imperialistas yanquis pusieron un lazo en su cuello, dijo y apunto que observara un poco mas la actitud estupida y torpe de los norteamericanos que estan sufriendo los momentos penosos y agonicos de su destino tragico.
					
					EE.UU., que con sus actos imprudentes lleva al borde de explosion la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, seria mejor calcular con la cabeza lucida la ventaja y la desventaja en la actual situacion, aconsejo.
					
					A fin de aliviar la situacion y prevenir el peligroso choque militar en la region de la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU., que creo el motivo de disputa introduciendo muchos armamentos estrategicos nucleares en el contorno de nuestro pais, debe ser primero en tomar la opcion correcta y mostrarla con sus acciones, apunto y continuo que el imperio debe abandonar de inmediato sus insolentes provocaciones y la obligacion unilateral contra la RPDC y no debe molestar mas a esta.
					
					Como ya hemos aclarado, tomaremos la decision importante si los norteamericanos siguen haciendo las locuras peligrosisimas en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana con el objetivo de examinar la paciencia de la RPDC, enfatizo y prosiguio que EE.UU. necesitara pensar razonablemente y juzgar correctamente para evitar otra deshonra por la RPDC ante todo el mundo.
					
					Si la imprudencia de EE.UU. pasa el limite y se ejecuta el planeado disparo amenazador de la RPDC, lo que sera un momento mas historico en que nuestros artilleros Hwasong estrangulen a los yanquis, dijo y ordeno a estar siempre en estado de disparo para que puedan iniciar en cualquier momento el combate real si lo decide el Partido.
					
					Luego, el Maximo Dirigente recorrio el centro de instruccion militar y el gimnasio, mientras que exhorto a establecer estrictamente el Juche en la educacion y elevar incesantemente el nivel cualitativo del cursillo militar para formar a todos los artilleros Hwasong de la gran unidad combinada como expertos de combate intelectual quienes asimilaron totalmente las modernas ciencias y tecnicas militares y el metodo de combate de nuestro estilo frente al cambiado modo de realizacion de guerra de los enemigos.
					
					Y hablo de la necesidad de establecer sin falta el sistema de reeducacion para los comandantes y los funcionarios tecnicos de las fuerzas estrategicas conforme a la modernizacion y el desarrollo de los cohetes balisticos.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente paso revista al comedor de la subunidad y otros establecimientos de servicio de intendencia de la gran unidad combinada para atender con amor paternal la vida de los militares.
					
					Este dia, Kim Jong Un presencio en la casa de militares la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la gran unidad combinada.
					
					Se puso satisfecho por la exitosa funcion preparada con las obras que reflejan de manera sincera la mision operacional y las caracteristicas de las fuerzas estrategicas, la aspiracion y el sentimiento ideologico de los artilleros Hwasong y dio preciosas instrucciones para las actividades de funcion artistica.
					
					Subrayo que son muy importantes la posicion y mision de las fuerzas estrategicas para realizar el proposito estrategico de nuestro Partido y enfatizo en la necesidad de establecer con firmeza el sistema unica de direccion, mando y administracion del Comandante Supremo sobre las fuerzas armadas nucleares y perfeccionar mas los autoctonos metodos de ataque coheteril.
					
					Me siento seguro gracias a tener las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC que garantizan firmemente el futuro eterno de la patria y la nacion, dijo y expreso la esperanza y la conviccion de que todos los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas estrategicas seran muy conscientes de la responsabilidad de su mision asumida ante el Partido, la patria y el pueblo y lograran nuevo viraje en los trabajos para completar la preparacion combativa.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, quienes recibieron la gran confianza del Maximo Dirigente, tomaron la firme decision de lograr la victoria final en la confrontacion antiyanqui al enarbolar en cada plataforma la bandera roja del Partido y la del Comandante Supremo y exterminar con el ataque demoledor y superpotente los blancos del Sur de Corea, Japon, la zona operacional del Pacifico y el territorio principal de EE.UU, si el Comandante Supremo da la orden.
					
					Le acompanaron al Maximo Dirigente el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y Kim Jong Sik, subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion a Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, Presidente de la Federacion Rusa.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 72o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, extiendo un caluroso saludo a Vd., y por su conducto, al vuestro pueblo amistoso.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones de amistad RPDC-Rusia, preparadas mediante la lucha conjunta en los dias de la enconada guerra antijaponesa, se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran invariablemente de acuerdo con los intereses de los pueblos de dos paises.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para formular sinceros votos por los exitos en sus responsabilidades para construir Rusia poderosa.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le extendiera el dia 11 Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, Presidente de la Federacion Rusa.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del dia de liberacion, le envio una felicitacion sincera a Vd.
					
					Recordamos con reverencia a los soldados del Ejercito Rojo y los patriotas coreanos, caidos en la lucha por la libertad y la independencia de vuestro pais.
					
					Estoy seguro de que el fortalecimiento de las relaciones de amistad y las cooperaciones constructivas entre Rusia y la RPDC conviene a nuestros intereses comunes y contribuye al aseguramiento de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Noreste Asiatico.
					
					Deseo buena salud y exitos a Vd., y la felicidad y el bienestar a todo el pueblo de vuestro pais.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita cumpleanos de Bounnhang Vorachith
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita cumpleanos de Bounnhang Vorachith
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion a Bounnhang Vorachith, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion de su 80o cumpleanos, le extiendo las mas cordiales felicitaciones y saludos camaraderiles.
					
					Estoy complacido de que bajo la correcta orientacion del PPRL encabezado por Vd., el hermano pueblo laosiano logra grandes exitos en la lucha por la prosperidad del pais y la consolidacion y desarrollo del regimen democratico popular.
					
					Convencido de que se intensificaran y se desarrollaran sin parar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos partidos, Estados y pueblos, preparadas y cultivadas por los lideres antecesores, formulo sinceros votos por la buena salud y felicidad de Vd. y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Congo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Congo
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Congo, Denis Sassou-Nguesso, en ocasion del 57o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano.
					Convencido de que seguiran intensificandose y desarrollandose tambien en el futuro las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente formulo sinceros votos por mayores exitos en la lucha del gobierno y el pueblo del Congo por construir una nueva sociedad pacifica y prospera bajo la sabia orientacion del destinatario.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana se refiere al tema de estadounidenses retenidos
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana se refiere al tema de estadounidenses retenidos
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- En estos dias, circulan las informaciones de medios extranjeros de que la RPDC y EE.UU. estan discutiendo a traves del canal de contacto bilateral de Nueva York el problema de estadounidenses retenidos.
					A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada al respecto, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio hoy la siguiente respuesta:
					
					En la actual atmosfera de relaciones RPDC-EE.UU., no cabe discutir el problema de estadounidenses retenidos.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el Congreso de Elogio a Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el Congreso de Elogio a Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el Congreso de Elogio a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu de 2017.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente honorario del Comite Preparatorio Internacional para el congreso, Ri Su Yong, vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y del comite preparatorio coreano para el congreso, y otros.
					
					Estuvieron presentes tambien el presidente honorario y los copresidentes del Comite Preparatorio Internacional, las delegaciones, delegados y personalidades de diversos estratos de varios paises, regiones y entidades democraticas internacionales asi como los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas de varios paises en Corea y otros.
					
					Quedaron trasladados un cesto de flores, dedicado al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un por los participantes en el V Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu, y las banderas congratulatorias, medallas, titulos honorificos, ordenes, premios, diplomas y regalos que obsequian los comites preparatorios internacional y regionales para el congreso, las entidades democraticas internacionales, los partidos politicos, entidades, organos y las personalidades de diferentes sectores de varios paises a los Grandes Hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
					
					En su informe de la ocasion, Peter Woods, copresidente del Comite Preparatorio Internacional y embajador de la Asociacion de Ciudades y Gobiernos Locales en la region de Asia-Pacifico, recordo que desde cuando se publicara en octubre de 2015 el llamamiento a celebrar una gran cita internacional para encomiar a los Grandes Hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, se desarrollaron activamente por doquier de los 5 continentes del mundo las actividades para expresar respeto a esos grandes sabios sin iguales y apoyar la justa causa del pueblo coreano.
					
					Manifesto la conviccion de que el presente festival servira de una ocasion significativa para demostrar a todo el mundo la fuerte aspiracion de los pueblos progresistas a elogiar las hazanas de Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung y Su Excelencia Dirigente Kim Jong Il y glorificar el siglo 21 como gran centuria de Kim Jong Un.
					
					Hubo discursos en la ocasion.
					
					C. P. Mainali, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Nepales (Marxista-Leninista) y titular del comite nacional nepales en memoria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, senalo que si bien estan registrados muchos hombres celebres en la historia de la humanidad, no hubo otro gran hombre como el Presidente Kim Il Sung y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, respetados y elogiados por la humanidad tanto en su vida como despues de su fallecimiento.
					
					V. Petrov, presidente de la Asociacion Rusa de Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y copresidente del Comite Preparatorio Internacional, destaco que los pueblos revolucionarios de todo el mundo, que recibieron la Declaracion del monte Paektu de 2017, lucharan con dinamismo por construir una nueva sociedad independiente confiando el futuro maravilloso en el Maximo Dirigente.
					
					En nombre del comite preparatorio coreano, Kim Jong Suk agradecio a todas las delegaciones y delegados quienes presentan y divulgan ampliamente las hazanas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y envian el apoyo y solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo coreano.
					
					Prosiguio que el pueblo coreano seguira luchando firmemente por hacer valer la verdadera justicia internacional estrechando la mano con los pueblos pacifistas del mundo.
					
					En la ocasion, quedo aprobada la carta que dirigen los participantes en el festival al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines en apoyo a la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines en apoyo a la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 los mitines de las provincias de Jagang y Hamgyong del Norte y la ciudad de Rason para expresar apoyo a la reciente declaracion del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En los actos participaron los funcionarios de los organos del partido, el poder y la economia, las entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de las respectivas localidades.
					
					En las ocasiones, se dio lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC y hubo discursos de los vicepresidentes de los comites del partido en las provincias y ciudad referidas y de los representantes de obreros, trabajadores agricolas, intelectuales y jovenes.
					
					Los oradores apoyaron unanimemente la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC que rechazo totalmente la "resolucion de sancion", inventada ilegalmente por EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles cuestionando el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental de la RPDC.
					
					Los militares y habitantes coreanos aprendieron la inmutable verdad de que gracias a la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, esta asegurada la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche a pesar de las maniobras desesperadas de los enemigos y nadie de este mundo podra frenar el avance de la RPDC, afirmaron.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles fabricaron varias veces las "resoluciones de sancion" cuestionando caso por caso el ejercicio de legitimos derechos de la RPDC, ninguna forma de sancion o presion pudo ponerla de rodillas, recalcaron.  
					
					Gracias al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, la unidad monolitica mas poderosa que el arma nuclear y al principio de autofortalecimiento, nuestro ejercito y pueblo podran defender firmemente la seguridad de la patria y lograr la victoria final de la causa socialista aunque se les abalancen en grupo los enemigos poderosos del planeta.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo desfiles masivos.

articles.title: Portavoz del comite norteno critica a autoridades japonesas
articles.content:
Portavoz del comite norteno critica a autoridades japonesas
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El vocero del Comite Coreano por Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso hizo publica el dia 15 una declaracion con motivo de que se cumplen 72 anos desde cuando la Segunda Guerra Mundial, que causo tremendos desastres y perdidas humanas, culminara con la capitulacion del imperialismo japones.
					La nota sigue abajo:
					
					Cuando todo el mundo recuerda a las victimas inocentes de la guerra, los altos funcionarios y los politicos de Japon acuden en grupo al Santuario Yasukuni para rendir culto a los criminales que cometieron el genocidio. Por otra parte, se distribuyen a las nuevas generaciones los libros que describen la guerra de agresion como la "justa" y la dominacion colonial sobre otras naciones como "cooperacion" y "contribucion" al desarrollo y la prosperidad.
					
					A pesar de que la verdad de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones fue confirmada con datos y su caracter ilegal ha sido comprobado por el derecho internacional, los reaccionarios japoneses estan dando movimientos atareados para invertir ese hecho tales como revisar la Declaracion de Kono, publicada oficialmente reconociendo ese crimen, y enjuiciar a la editorial del periodico que informo el reclutamiento forzado de las esclavas sexuales.
					
					Para evadir la liquidacion de los crimenes del pasado pendientes con la RPDC como lo hizo durante varios decenios, ellos recrudecen la campana de sancion anti-RPDC hablando tanto de la supuesta "amenaza" e inculcan la extremada hostilidad y enemistad anti-RPDC reprimiendo salvajemente a la Asociacion General de los Coreanos Residentes en Japon y los coreanos radicados en el pais isla.
					
					A Japon le queda la unica opcion hoy en dia cuando se eleva de dia en dia la posicion estrategica de la RPDC como potencia nuclear del Juche y la militar de talla mundial.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben darse cuenta de que tienen la tarea fatal e inevitable de liquidar sus crimenes antieticos cometidos contra la nacion coreana, reflexionar sinceramente y responsabilizarse de su expediente criminal contra otros pueblos asiaticos, inclusive la esclavitud sexual.

articles.title: Descubiertos nuevos datos sobre el acto criminal de Japon contra pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Descubiertos nuevos datos sobre el acto criminal de Japon contra pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- Segun Yonhap News, quedaron descubiertos en un hospital del departamento de Chiba de Japon los datos sobre los coreanos que cogieron enfermedades psiquicas durante la Guerra del Pacifico desatada por el imperialismo japones.
					De acuerdo con los datos, casi 100 coreanos movilizados en esa guerra en contra de su voluntad resultaron enfermos de ese tipo al cabo de sufrir la desesperacion y la pesadilla.
					
					Entre ellos, un joven padecio la enfermedad mental durante varias decadas posteriores a la derrota de Japon en la guerra y murio finalmente en un hospital.
					
					Los recien revelados datos no pasan de ser una minima parte de los incontables crimenes cometidos en el siglo pasado por Japon en contra del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Ellos vuelven a desmentir el embuste de los reaccionarios japoneses para negar la historia de sus crimenes.
